extension.description: Creates Sets and optimized video playlists from Personal collected Media. This version focuses on playlist creation and media playback, without integrated download features.
extension.news: [B]v1.5.1[/B] - Added language strings (English, Dutch, Portuguese). [B]v1.5.0[/B] - Implemented user profiles (Normal/Pro). Added context menu options for Play and Download. Improved file filtering options (min/max size, date filter, scan depth). Enhanced playlist ordering (custom folder order, newest files to top). Added download filename cleanup and adult content specific download settings. [B]v1.4.5[/B] - Pre-Refactor with AI Integration.
